title: PAU Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: Punjab Agricultural University (PAU) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, B.Sc, and Post Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the PAU Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date of a...
